title: Pitchforks and Torches: The Worst of the Worst, from Beck, Bill, and Bush to Palin and Other Posturing Republicans
description: An irresistible new collection from the New York Times bestselling author and host of MSNBC's Countdown with Keith Olbermann In his particular wit and style, Keith Olbermann skewers politicians, celebrities, and people behaving badly every weeknight on MSNBC's increasingly popular Countdown with Keith Olbermann . This book starts right after President Obama's election and collects all of Olbermann's acclaimed ""Special Comments,"" a few of his ""Quick Comments,"" all but one of his feature ""WTF,"" selections of ""Bushed"" and ""Still Bushed,"" and, of course, a healthy dose of ""The Worst Person in the World.""
author: Keith Olbermann
